short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: My-TV.works allows accessing movies, TV series, music and even chat bots t are blocked in your location.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: My-TV.works let's you watch BBC iPlayer and German TV and streaming services even when you are in Geo-blocked location! This works faster than VPN because only necessary requests are tunnelled through our servers. Requests which are not relevant for the streaming services to work are not sent through our proxy servers.
